fields.name: Amount of ESG targets current year

views.name: Sustainable goals with targets in the current year

rows.field_1593211: End poverty in all its forms everywhere.
End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition, and promote sustainable agriculture.
Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages.
Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all.
Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls.
Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all.
Ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable, and modern energy for all.
Promote sustained, inclusive, and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment, and decent work for all.
Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization, and foster innovation.
Reduce inequality within and among countries.
Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient, and sustainable.
Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns.
Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts.
Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas, and marine resources for sustainable development.
Protect, restore, and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation.
Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all, and build effective, accountable, and inclusive institutions.
Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the global partnership for sustainable development.

fields.name: Target reached at
fields.formula:
if(or(totext(field('Target type')) = '% reduction',totext(field('Target type')) = '% increase'),
field('Current') * field('Target value') / 100 ,field('Target value') - field('Current'))

fields.name: Current state
fields.formula: if(or(totext(field('Target type')) = '% reduction',totext(field('Target type')) = '% increase'),sum(lookup('ESG Initiatives','Actual impact')),avg(lookup('ESG Initiatives','Actual impact')))

views.name: Targets that have passed the deadline

rows.field_1593264: Reduce carbon emissions by 20% compared to the previous year's baseline
Increase employee diversity to 50% representation across all departments
Achieve a transparency score of 90% in the governance reporting index
Reduce water consumption by 15% compared to last year's usage
Implement health programs with at least 80% employee participation
Conduct ethics training for all employees with a 100% completion rate
Reduce waste generation by 25% compared to the previous year
Engage in community projects with 100 hours volunteered per employee
Improve shareholder transparency by providing quarterly reports
Increase the use of recycled materials in production by 40%
